data.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
data.author: Bernard M. Baruch

data.quote:
You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching,
Love like you'll never be hurt,
Sing like there's nobody listening,
And live like it's heaven on earth
data.author: William W. Purkey

data.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
data.author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

data.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
data.author: Elbert Hubbard

data.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
data.author: Stephen Chbosky, The Perks of Being a Wallflower

data.quote: Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results.
data.author: Narcotics Anonymous

data.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
